remarks:
Define division.  Theorem ~ divmuli relates it to multiplication, and ~ divcli and ~ redivcli prove its closure laws.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-Apr-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)

 Define division.  Theorem ~ divmulap relates it to multiplication, and ~ divclap and ~ redivclap prove its closure laws.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-Apr-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
